name: Linden Scripting Language
description: A Nova extension providing syntax highlighting for Linden Scripting Language (LSL), the scripting language used in the Second LifeÂ® and OpenSimulator virtual world platforms.

config.title: Path to builtins.txt
config.description: List of LSL built-in functions and parameters. By default, uses the builtins.txt that comes with this version (KWDB 0.0.20231219001). See LSLint/README.md for more information on how to build your own file. A LSL-only bultins-only-lsl.txt is also provided for convenience.

config.title: Executable Path
config.description: Optionally provide the project-relative or absolute path to the LSLint executable. This field is normally not required, as this extension already comes bundled with LSLint. For absolute paths, prefix the path with '/', and for project-relative paths simply omit that prefix.

config.title: Debugging
config.description: Show debug logs in Extension Console.
